GSD.description:
RISC-V: Add fast call path of crash_kexec()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.63 by commit c5a8d05120189b04885289ed7a0509f9cd068537. For more details please see the references link.
